message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $9,750.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500.
I understand you're sticking to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product for $9,600.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,550.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll offer the product for $9,700. This is my final concession.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,650.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll offer the product for $9,750. This is my last offer.
After reviewing our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $9,675.
